tourBios.curYrHigh: T20 at the Tour's Bayview Place Island Savings Open.

tourBios.curYearHigh: T20 at the Tour's Bayview Place Island Savings Open.

tourBios.intlVics: 2013: West Coast Golf Group Invitational [Can], 2014: Vancouver Open [Can]
tourBios.curYrHigh: T20 at the Tour's Bayview Place Island Savings Open.
tourBios.carHigh: 2014: Finished T11 at the Mackenzie Tour's Qualifying School in California to earn exempt status...In 10th start, thanks to a first-round 63, T5 at the Wildfire Invitational, three shots out of a three-way playoff...Continued the strong play with a T15 at the Cape Breton Celtic Classic the following week to secure his spot in the top-60 on the Order of Merit to lock up exempt status for the following season...Finished a career-best T2 at the TOUR Championship of Canada, one shot behind winner and good friend, Ryan Williams. 2013: Made three cuts in nine events with a career best finish, T13, coming at the Times Colonist Island Savings Open...Finished 81st on the Order of Merit to lose his card. 2012: Made five cuts, enjoying his best finish of the season, a T16 at the Times Colonist Island Savings Open...Received non-exempt status after finishing T17 at the 2011 California Winter Qualifying School.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won two tournaments on the Vancouver Golf Tour in 2010 (Swan-e-set Classic and Nickel Heating Open).
tourBios.personal: A huge New Orleans Saints fan...Avid fisherman...Favorite course is the Club de golf Uruguay...Favorite professional team is Vancouver Canucks.

tourBios.curYearHigh: T20 at the Tour's Bayview Place Island Savings Open.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was T2nd in 2014 at the TOUR Championship of Canada presented by Freedom 55 Financial.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 91st in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
